AddConfiguration<TEntity>(ModelBuilder, IEntityTypeConfiguration<TEntity>)

Adds an entity type configuration to the ModelBuilder.

public static void AddConfiguration<TEntity>(this ModelBuilder modelBuilder, IEntityTypeConfiguration<TEntity> configuration) where TEntity : class

Parameters

modelBuilder ModelBuilder

The ModelBuilder to which the configuration is added.

configuration IEntityTypeConfiguration<TEntity>

The entity type configuration.

The entity type.
